text: Gwangju Global Motors Co. Ltd. (GGM) is a car manufacturing company in Gwangju, South Korea. It is a joint venture between Hyundai Motor Company and the Gwangju city government. The company was founded in 2019, and its factory opened in 2021. The plant is the first new car factory in South Korea since 1998. The factory produces mainly the Hyundai Casper, which was the first model made there. The factory can make up to 70,000 cars each year. It is the only Hyundai plant in South Korea without a workers' union. ==References== Category:Companies of South Korea Category:Automobile companies
title: Gwangju Global Motors
